name: Prehistoric Tales
description: By a twist of fate, you turn out to be the chief of a small tribe of islanders invaded by neighbors. In order to deal with the invasion, collect food and resources, teach an army, and prove yourself as a strategist in captivating step-by-step battles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1600 MZH Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Q:Do I like it?Why? A:No.I dont.for a teenagers that spend his times playing competitive FPS,Prehistoric Tales really is the last game i would play in my library.with the incredibly high price tag,it fail to deliver what it promised.if you though Prehistoric Tales is Clash Of Clan-ish game,it is not.instead,it is a mobile port games intended to entertain little kids  Q:Overall? A:a boring,mobile port,overpriced game  Q:Any useful tips? A:dont waste your money here.go buy some more Gamma Cases  DA SENTENCEEE  SLEEP SIMULATOR 2K16 IGN10/10
